events.title: Wedding
events.name: John and Emily's Wedding
events.short_description: Elegant and romantic celebration of love.
events.description: John and Emily's wedding is a grand celebration of love and commitment. This elegant event will be held in a beautiful countryside venue with stunning views. Guests will enjoy a memorable evening filled with delicious food, music, and dancing. Join us in celebrating this special day with the newlyweds!

events.title: Birthday Party
events.name: Sarah's 30th Birthday Bash
events.description: Join us in celebrating Sarah's 30th birthday with a fun-filled party! There will be games, delicious food, and a lively atmosphere. Whether you're young or young at heart, this birthday bash is the perfect place to have a good time. Don't miss out on the excitement!

events.title: Anniversary
events.name: Mark and Lisa's 25th Anniversary
events.short_description: A silver jubilee of love and togetherness.
events.description: Mark and Lisa are celebrating their 25th wedding anniversary, and you're invited to join in the festivities! This special event will be a night to remember, with a romantic dinner, dancing, and heartwarming speeches. Come and celebrate their enduring love story with us!

events.title: Engagement Party
events.name: Alex and Olivia's Engagement Soiree
events.short_description: A joyous occasion to celebrate their love story.
events.description: Alex and Olivia are thrilled to announce their engagement! Join us for a delightful evening filled with laughter and love. The engagement party will feature delicious hors d'oeuvres, champagne toasts, and heartwarming speeches from the happy couple. Let's raise a glass to their future together!

events.title: Retirement Party
events.name: David's Retirement Celebration
events.description: After years of dedicated service, David is finally retiring. Join us in celebrating his well-deserved retirement with good food, great company, and fond memories. It's a time to honor his accomplishments and wish him all the best in this new chapter of life!

events.title: Baby Shower
events.name: Emily's Baby Shower
events.short_description: A sweet celebration for the mom-to-be.
events.description: Let's shower Emily with love and best wishes as she prepares to welcome her bundle of joy! This baby shower will be a delightful afternoon filled with games, gifts, and sweet treats. Join us in celebrating this special moment in Emily's life.

events.title: Graduation Party
events.name: Megan's Graduation Celebration
events.description: Megan has successfully graduated, and it's time to celebrate her achievements! Join us for a graduation party filled with joy, laughter, and great food. We'll be raising a toast to Megan's bright future and all the hard work that got her here.

events.title: Holiday Party
events.name: Annual Holiday Extravaganza
events.description: Get ready for the most festive event of the year! Our annual holiday extravaganza is here to spread joy and merriment. Join us for a night of holiday-themed decorations, delicious seasonal dishes, and dancing to your favorite tunes. Let's celebrate the magic of the season together!

events.title: Housewarming Party
events.name: Jack and Lily's New Home Celebration
events.short_description: Warmly welcoming friends to their new abode.
events.description: Jack and Lily have a new place to call home, and they want to celebrate it with you! Join us for a housewarming party filled with laughter, good company, and a tour of their lovely new house. It's a great opportunity to catch up and create new memories.

events.title: Class Reunion
events.name: Class of 2000 Reunion
events.short_description: Reconnecting with old friends and reliving memories.
events.description: It's time to relive the good old days! The Class of 2000 is hosting a reunion, and we hope you'll be there to reconnect with old friends, reminisce about school days, and create new memories. Join us for a night of nostalgia and fun!
